subSubSection.paragraph: Polyalthia chinensis S.K.Wu & P.T.Li in Acta Phytotax. Sin. 14 (1): 108, t. 4. 1976. Basionym

China. Xizang: Medog , 20 Auguest 1974, Qinghai-Xizang Exped. 74-4451 (holotype, PE! [barcode no., PE01187290]; isotypes, PE! [[barcode no., PE01187291, PE01187292, PE01187293], KUN! [barcode no., KUN0677650]).
Known from Medog in Xingzang Province (Fig. 5 ), growing in rain forests, at low to medium elevations (800-1000 m a.s.l.).
B. S. Li & S. Z. Cheng 2668 (PE).
DD ( IUCN 2012 ). This species is only represented by two collections in Medog in Xizang Province. As Medog is not well explored, we tentatively recommend the conservation status as Data Deficient.
